description: Jacob recently found out that his boyfriend cheated on him. Apparently his, now, ex boyfriend, cheated on him constantly. He was plowing ass all over town and Jacob had no idea until his best friend told him. Jacob was so pissed off that, instead of getting sad, he decided to get even. His ex boyfriend didn't have a very big dick, and by didn't have a big dick, we mean; it was actually tiny. So Jacob decided to find one of the biggest dicks he could find and tape the massive dick fucking him deep and hard, unlike his cheating. Watch this massive man meat destroy Jacob's tight ass and unload globs of tasty, salty jizz all over Jacob's face.
title: So Good
